short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays random Bible verses on the new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tab into a source of daily inspiration with Daily Inspiration: Bible Verses on New Tab! Each time you open a tab, enjoy a beautifully displayed Bible verse to uplift your spirit and bring encouragement. With a clean, distraction-free design, this extension offers timeless wisdom and positivity, perfect for anyone seeking faith, motivation, or a moment of peace in their daily routine. Install now and refresh both your browser and your soul!
